attributes.additional_details:
Regardless of circumstances (and indeed we should look into those once this is quashed) there is no excuse for this sort of behaviour on our streets. We call upon the UK government, and the Prime Minister in particular, to do whatever needs to be done to finish these riots NOW.

The Home Secretary’s refusal to bring in more drastic measures such as water cannons, rubber bullets, or indeed the army, are totally out of touch and utterly unacceptable to us, regular law abiding citizens. This is not a situation that can be policed “by consent”.

We have had enough. Do your job!
